attributes.action: Mark and Ben G  and Ellie are cool!!!!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On behalf of class 10x1 Adam has nominated Mark and Ben G and Ellie as the coolest guys and girl ever and that they need a day to fully recognise their amazing coolness. I would reccomend the date of October 12 to appreciate them.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
